item.title: Elf Loader
item.description: ELF Load: Dynamic load and execute for your mcu. Perfect, you’ve created your embedded system, provided it with an external storage system, created a serial terminal to test things out, and then started your journey through routine… testing as if you were sitting on an old 70’s ticker while you listen to “Sheer Heart Attack” by Queen (a plus for the sound without a synth) But wait! This is not totally the old-fashionist experience… My binaries must be embedded in the firmware in order to work!

item.title: Fisrt Post
item.description: Welcome to our site Hello everyone, welcome to the engineering blog “ourEmbedded”. We hope that the blog section is useful for all of you. We will be publishing technical notes, works carried out by our engineers, and comments on new techniques and products that we consider useful for all of you. Additionally, all of you are welcome to send your questions, doubts or suggestions to our engineering staff. About ourEmbeddeds We are a fresh company formed by entusiast engineers and expersts with great skills in electronic engineering, deep embedded oftware, communication systems, RF technologies and many other reas of interest.

item.title: Contact
item.description: We are here to help you If you have any questions, do not hesitate to ask us. We are available 24/7 although we may take time to answer depending on the work flow we have.
